product_name: Omega Pacific Jake Keylock Quik-Lok Carabiner
long_description: With a side-swing gate that provides great clearance and a key lock nose that won't snag on ropes or slings, the Omega Pacific Jake Keylock Quik-Lok Carabiner is ideal for use as a belay 'biner. Side-swing gate provides you with greater gate clearance than most other locking carabiners, making it easy to clip ropes, slings and harness belay loops. Key lock nose won't snag on pro, ropes or slings, making the 'biner simple to clip. Quik-Lock auto-locking gate ensures the gate is locked whenever it is closed; gate can be opened with 1 hand. HMS shape of the Omega Pacific Jake Keylock Quik-Lok Carabiner centers the load to keep the rope from being pinched on the spine for smooth-running rappels and belays.
short_description: With a side-swing gate that provides great clearance and a key lock nose that won't snag on ropes or slings, the Omega Pacific Jake Keylock Quik-Lok Carabiner is ideal for use as a belay 'biner.
